meanings.definition: The state of being fearful or afraid.
meanings.sent1: Her fearfulnesses kept her from exploring new places.
meanings.sent2: The dark forest was full of fearfulnesses for the young child.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fearfulnesses of cucumbers always made the family laugh.
meanings.sent4: The fearfulnesses in her eyes were like storm clouds on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The fearfulnesses in the haunted house made it impossible to stay calm.

meanings.definition: The quality of causing fear or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The horror movie was filled with fearfulnesses that made everyone jump.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house had an aura of fearfulnesses that sent shivers down spines.
meanings.sent3: The clown's fearfulnesses were unintentional but still scared the children.
meanings.sent4: The fearfulnesses of the unknown lurked in the shadows of the old mansion.
meanings.sent5: The fearfulnesses of the deep ocean were enough to make even the bravest sailor tremble.
